Player History
Had first career hit on 4/1/1975, off Ron Bryant (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1975, off Tom Seaver (CHW)...
Injured on 6/21/1975 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1976, hitting .619 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against New York (A) on 4/13/1976...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1978...
Released by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1978...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/2/1978 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/14/1978 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/26/1978 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/1979 with a Fractured Socket Eye, out for 9 weeks...
Injured on 6/10/1980 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1983 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/1/1984...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1985 (Going to STL: P T. Burns, 2B M. Lemke. Going to CHC: P B. Burns)...
Injured on 4/13/1986 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P B. Smith. Going to NYY: LF M. Young, 3B M. Funderburk, P D. Stieb, P B. Burns, C I. Calderon)...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $6,456,123 per year...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1993, going 5-0, 2.32...
Injured on 10/20/1993 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1994, going 5-1, 2.18...
